description:
When there are a number of VMs in VCenter(1200vm+) managed by nova, the nova compute service need to take more than 
1.5 h to get start. 

Since the init host will try to sync all VMs power status from VCenter, with VM's nubmer increased, this will also cost a lot of time.  This will severely impact the the performance for getting compute service up.
title: VMWare: with a nubmer of VMs in place, compute process take a long time to get start
